00028 ultimix.data_form.CreateForm = function( Action )
00029 {
00030       if( jQuery( '#data_form' ).length )
00031       {
00032             jQuery( '#data_form' ).remove();
00033       }
00034 
00035       jQuery( 'body' ).append( '<form id="data_form" method="post" style="display: none;"></form>' );
00036       
00037       if( Action )
00038       {
00039             jQuery( '#data_form' ).attr( 'action' , Action );
00040       }
00041 }
00042 
00052 ultimix.data_form.ValidateFieldsExistance = function( Fields )
00053 {
00054       for( i in Fields )
00055       {
00056             if( document.getElementById( Fields[ i ] ) == null )
00057             {
00058                   ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( 'Field ' + Fields[ i ] + ' was not found' , ultimix.get_string( 'Error' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_OK | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONERROR | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00059                   return( false );
00060             }
00061       }
00062       
00063       return( true );
00064 }
00065 
00073 ultimix.data_form.MoveFormData = function( SourceFormSelector )
00074 {
00075       var                     Items = jQuery( SourceFormSelector );
00076       if( Items.length == 1 )
00077       {
00078             var                     TagName = jQuery( Items[ 0 ] ).attr( 'tagName' );
00079             TagName = TagName.toLowerCase();
00080             
00081             if( TagName == 'form' )
00082             {
00083                   jQuery( SourceFormSelector ).children().clone().appendTo( '#data_form' );
00084             }
00085             else
00086             {
00087                   jQuery( SourceFormSelector ).clone().appendTo( '#data_form' );
00088             }
00089       }
00090       else
00091       {
00092             jQuery( SourceFormSelector ).clone().appendTo( '#data_form' );
00093       }
00094 }

00105 ultimix.data_form.SuccessFunction = function( SourceFormSelector , Waiting )
00106 {
00107       return(
00108             function( Result )
00109             {
00110                   if( Result == ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES )
00111                   {
00112                         ultimix.data_form.MoveFormData( SourceFormSelector );
00113                   
00114                         document.getElementById( 'data_form' ).submit();
00115                         
00116                         if( Waiting )
00117                         {
00118                               ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00119                         }
00120                   }
00121             }
00122       );
00123 }

00138 ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm = function( SourceFormSelector , ConfirmString , Action , Waiting )
00139 {
00140       ultimix.data_form.CreateForm( Action );
00141       
00142       Success = ultimix.data_form.SuccessFunction( SourceFormSelector , Waiting );
00143 
00144       if( ConfirmString )
00145       {
00146             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ConfirmString , ultimix.get_string( 'Question' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YESNO | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL , Success );
00147             return;
00148       }
00149       
00150       Success( ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES );
00151 }

00166 ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm0 = function( ConfirmString , Action , Waiting )
00167 {
00168       ultimix.data_form.CreateForm( Action );
00169       
00170       FormId = 'data_form';
00171 
00172       Success = function( Result )
00173       {
00174             if( Result == ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES )
00175             {
00176                   document.getElementById( FormId ).submit();
00177                   
00178                   if( Waiting )
00179                   {
00180                         ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00181                   }
00182             }
00183       }
00184 
00185       if( ConfirmString )
00186       {
00187             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ConfirmString , ultimix.get_string( 'Question' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YESNO | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL , Success );
00188             return;

00209 ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm1 = function( Param1 , Value1 , ConfirmString , Action , Waiting )
00210 {
00211       ultimix.data_form.CreateForm( Action );
00212       
00213       FormId = 'data_form';
00214 
00215       if( ultimix.data_form.ValidateFieldsExistance( [ Param1 ] ) == false )
00216       {
00217             return;
00218       }
00219       
00220       Success = function( Result )
00221       {
00222             if( Result == ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES )
00223             {
00224                   document.getElementById( Param1 ).setAttribute( 'value' , Value1 );
00225 
00226                   document.getElementById( FormId ).submit();
00227                   
00228                   if( Waiting )
00229                   {
00230                         ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00231                   }
00232             }
00233       }
00234 
00235       if( ConfirmString )
00236       {
00237             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ConfirmString , ultimix.get_string( 'Question' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YESNO | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL , Success );
00238             return;
00239       }
00240       
00241       Success( ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES );
00242 }

00263 ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm2 = function( Param1 , Value1 , Param2, Value2 , ConfirmString , Action , Waiting )
00264 {
00265       ultimix.data_form.CreateForm( Action );
00266       
00267       FormId = 'data_form';
00268       
00269       if( ultimix.data_form.ValidateFieldsExistance( [ Param1 , Param2 ] ) == false )
00270       {
00271             return;
00272       }
00273       
00274       Success = function( Result )
00275       {
00276             if( Result == ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES )
00277             {
00278                   document.getElementById( Param1 ).setAttribute( 'value' , Value1 );
00279                   document.getElementById( Param2 ).setAttribute( 'value' , Value2 );
00280 
00281                   document.getElementById( FormId ).submit();
00282                   
00283                   if( Waiting )
00284                   {
00285                         ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00286                   }
00287             }
00288       }
00289 
00290       if( ConfirmString )
00291       {
00292             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ConfirmString , ultimix.get_string( 'Question' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YESNO | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL , Success );
00293             return;
00294       }
00295       
00296       Success( ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES );
00297 }

00322 ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm3 = function( Param1 , Value1 , Param2 , Value2 , Param3 , Value3 , ConfirmString , Action , Waiting )
00323 {
00324       ultimix.data_form.CreateForm( Action );
00325       
00326       FormId = 'data_form';
00327 
00328       if( ultimix.data_form.ValidateFieldsExistance( [ Param1 , Param2 , Param3 ] ) == false )

00330             return;
00331       }
00332       
00333       Success = function( Result )
00334       {
00335             if( Result == ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES )

00337                   document.getElementById( Param1 ).setAttribute( 'value' , Value1 );
00338                   document.getElementById( Param2 ).setAttribute( 'value' , Value2 );
00339                   document.getElementById( Param3 ).setAttribute( 'value' , Value3 );
00340                   
00341                   document.getElementById( FormId ).submit();
00342                   
00343                   if( Waiting )
00344                   {
00345                         ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );

00347             }
00348       }
00349 
00350       if( ConfirmString )
00351       {

00353             return;
00354       }
